step_by_step_reasoning: I'm now on the Hacker News Search page (hn.algolia.com). I can see there's a search box with the placeholder 'Search stories by title, url or author'. I need to search for 'AI' and then find the title of the first search result. Let me type 'AI' in the search box and search.
python_code:
async def act(page):
    # Find the search box and type 'AI'
    search_box = page.get_by_role("searchbox", name="Search stories by title, url or author")
    await search_box.first.click(timeout=15000)
    await search_box.first.fill("AI", timeout=15000)
    # Press Enter to search
    await search_box.first.press("Enter", timeout=15000)
    # Wait for search results to load
    await page.wait_for_timeout(2000)
formatted_code:
async def act(page):
    # Find the search box and type 'AI'
    search_box = page.get_by_role("searchbox", name="Search stories by title, url or author")
    await search_box.first.click(timeout=15000)
    await search_box.first.fill("AI", timeout=15000)
    # Press Enter to search
    await search_box.first.press("Enter", timeout=15000)
    # Wait for search results to load
    await page.wait_for_timeout(2000)
